All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminActivity
AdminActivity is the entry point for administrators.
AdminActivityTest
 
AdminDashboardFragment
AdminDashboardFragment represents the dashboard for administrators.
AdminDashboardFragmentTest
 
Announcement
This class represents Announcement objects in the app, with String fields for the announcements title, body image UID, and event UID.
AnnouncementListActivity
This activity obtains and displays a list of announcements sent for that even.
AnnouncementListAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter to handle a list of Announcement objects.
AnnouncementsTest
 
CustomFirebaseAuth
Class for authenticating a user with Firebase
EditFieldDialogFragment
The edit dialog fragment for editing the user's profile
EditFieldDialogFragment.EditFieldDialogListener
An interface for defining the functions for performing an action when a button is pressed in the dialog
Event
Represents an event within the application.
Event.OnBitmapReceivedListener
Listener for determining when a bitmap file is received from the database
EventDetailsActivity
EventDetailsActivity allows organizers to view and edit details of an event.
EventDetailsActivity.UserRole
An enum for the user roles TODO: Need to change to proper parameters
EventDetailsActivity.UserRoleCallback
The interface for determining when data is received
EventDetailsActivityTest
 
EventListActivity
EventListActivity is responsible for displaying a list of events to the user.
EventListActivityTest
 
EventListAdapter
EventListAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter designed to bind an ArrayList of Event objects to views for display in a ListView.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
GetFIDUtil
Helper function to quickly get the Firebase Installation ID (fid)
GetFIDUtil.DataLoadedListener
Interface that allows for synchronization
ImageAdapter
Adapter class for managing a RecyclerView that displays a list of images.
ImageAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this adapter has been clicked.
ImageAdapter.ViewHolder
A ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.
ImageInfo
A class representing the information about an image, including the image itself, its storage path on Firebase Storage, and optionally its Firestore document ID.
ImageListActivity
Activity class to display a list of images from Firebase.
ImageSelectionFragment
A Fragment for selecting images from different categories such as event pictures and profile pictures.
ImageSelectionFragmentTest
 
MainActivity
The first page that the user sees.
NewEventActivity
NewEventActivity facilitates the creation of new events by organizers.
NewEventActivityTest
 
OnItemClickListener
An interface for setting an on item click listener for the profile
Profile
Represents an profile for the admin page
ProfileActivity
Activity for displaying and editing an attendee's profile.
ProfileActivityTest
 
ProfileListActivity
ProfileListActivity is responsible for displaying a list of user profiles retrieved from a database.
ProfileListAdapter
ProfileListAdapter is an adapter class for populating a RecyclerView with Profile objects.
ProfileUnitTest
 
PushNotificationService
This service handles incoming push notifications for the app.
QRCode
Represents an QR code within the application.
QRCode.DataLoadedListener
Interface for checking when data is loaded into the qrcode
QRCode.NewCodeListener
Interface for checking when there is a new code loaded into the class
QRCode.OnBitmapReceivedListener
Interface for checking when the image is loaded from the database
QRScanner
Implements a QR code scanner activity to scan a QR code to check into an event
QRScannerTest
 
SendAnnouncementActivity
This class defines the page where organizers can create announcements to send to attendees.
ShowImageFragment
A fragment for showing a given Bitmap image
User
This class defines and represents a user It also includes all database accesses for user functions
User.DataLoadedListener
Interface for checking when data is loaded into the user
User.OnBitmapReceivedListener
Interface for checking when the image is loaded from the database
User.UserCreatedListener
Interface for checking when a new user is created
